description: There's no better way to celebrate Easter than with a Mimosa&nbsp;Margarita. This delightful combination of orange juice,&nbsp;champagne, and&nbsp;tequila is the perfect pick-me-up for a spring day.The best part about this cocktail is that you can easily tailor it to your liking. If you like your drinks on the sweeter side, simply add more orange juice. If you prefer a boozier drink, feel free to add an extra shot of tequila.No matter how you make it, a Mimosa Margarita is sure to put a smile on your face this Easter.
